[1000 hrs 12.01.2020]
Flaming on 3rd round? Calling everyone who is better than you cheaters? Having no gamesense after 500+ hours? Racing for ranks that doesn't mean anything? Welcome to cs in 2020.
There is too much toxic people who is ready to ruin your game and give everyone a bad mood. Vanity, pride, pettiness, hate with no reason and too serious attitude to the game - meet 95% cs players.

Recently someone told me that I'm one of the nicest people in cs just for not flaming my mates and trying to cheer up. Spend your time with friends, but never take it as something even a bit more than just anoter game.
